website_summaries.verdict: The budget Pentax Optio E30 is a dumpy point-and-shoot compact camera with a paucity of features and average picture quality, but its cheerful interface and child-friendly attibutes make it fun to use

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Pentax Optio E30 a few months ago. After taking a few pictures (10-15) I had to replace the batteries. The new batteries lasted only 2-3 days and I only used the camera for less than an hour. I bought a charger and some rechargeable Ni-Mh batteries. They don't fare any better than the alkaline. I very seldom use this camera and the batteries go dead just sitting in the camera for 2 to 4 weeks. I would not recommend this camera to anyone I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and easy to use too!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to take with me on a trip to Arizona. It was very easy to use and I was able to take some really great pictures. The only drawback (and it's a minor one), was that I missed the view finder. I only missed it when there was too much sun to see the LCD screen. Otherwise, great little camera!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAD

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice little camera. Rarely takes a bad photo. Nice resolution, color. Fairly fast. Good video with sound too.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice little camera
customer_reviews.text: GOOD VALUE. TAKES DECENT PICTURES.THIS IS MY FIRST DIGITAL CAMERA, AND I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY CHOICE.
customer_reviews.author: K. Allwood

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good camera for the money. I don't care too much about mega pixels; I wanted a name brand that had a 3x zoom at a low cost, this E30 fit the bill. This camera comes with some of the best software available in my opinion. The E30 is also durable. I accidentally slung it across the sidewalk about 15feet (it slipped from my hand). Just a minor scratch is all that happened. For $115.00 this camera is a bargain
customer_reviews.author: R. taran

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera!! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best digital camera I have ever used. The menus are intuitive and the ease of operation is unmatched. The photo quality is impeccable and the videos are amazing. The sound quality is great and there is no chop in the framing. I have used this camera for high speed sporting events and it looks like every shot was a photo that was posed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moore-Buutz

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures, bad hardware
customer_reviews.text: This made in China camera takes really good pictures, but after 1 year of few use both the zoom button and right arrow key (macro) stopped working (and also the pictures' display did). The miss of a viewer is a pity, and it takes to much energy of batteries (it lasts less of 100 pictures, average use).
customer_reviews.author: M. Schwindt

customer_reviews.title: it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: for this price- camera is ok.it's nice, menu is easy to navigate.it doesn't have viewfinder and this is real disadvantage.macro mode really sucks....and the zoom is little noisy...but unless you've got focus, the picture will be good.true point-and-shoot camera.if you want more-have to pay more:))
customer_reviews.author: Maia M. Racheva

customer_reviews.title: Its great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is great for the price. The only thing I miss is the view finder. Tried to take pictures in Badlands Nat.Park The sun was in my face so the LCD screen was very hard to see. The pictures from the camera are great. Overall its a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cruse

customer_reviews.title: New Camera
customer_reviews.text: I checked out a few cameras and found this was the best buy. It is a top brand, Easy to use, Outstanding features, And the price I could not pass up. Picture quality is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Frank Bratjan

product_meta.title: Pentax Optio E30 7.1MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Named for the easy-to-use line of Pentax compact digital cameras, the Optio E30 offers 7.1 effective megapixels for exceptional high-resolution photography. Featuring AA battery compatibility, the Optio E30 is a convenient travel companion that uses less power and captures up to approximately 200 photos with alkaline batteries or 760 shots with lithium AA batteries. A helpful Green mode allows new digital camera users to enjoy effortless picture-taking, while additional features include a large 2.4-inch LCD monitor, a 3x optical zoom, and 11 MB of built-in memory.

 Compatibility with widely available AA batteries
Powered by AA batteries, the Pentax Optio E30 is great for travel and is designed to use less power and allow up 200 photos from one set of alkaline batteries or 760 shots on a set of lithium AA batteries.

 Green mode for automated setup
The Optio E30 Green mode automates camera setup when shooting still images. With a single touch, the camera sets the exposure, sensitivity, white balance, and other parameters according to the shooting conditions.

 Mode Palette displays intuitive icons
The Mode Pallette selection of shooting and playback modes displays all 15 mode icons on the LCD monitor (including Landscape, Pet, Food, and more) to expedite mode selection with straightforward display and guide function.

 3x optical zoom
The Optio E30 features a 3x optical zoom lens with a focal range covering angles of view equivalent to those of a 36-108mm lens in 35mm format, which is ideal for a broad spectrum of subjects from landscapes to portraits. This zooming power may be combined with 4x digital zoom to achieve a total of 12x zoom capability.

 Large 2.4-inch LCD monitor
The Optio E30 features a large 2.4-inch LCD monitor despite its compact body dimensions. The monitor size make it easier to compose and play back images and permits easy operation.

 Compatibility with the ImageLink printing system
The Optio E30 is compatible with the ImageLink printing system. By simply placing the Optio E30 on the printer's dock of ImageLink-compatible printers, users may print images without a PC.

 Additional features: 

 * Supports the new SDHC memory cards in addition to conventional SD memory cards 
 * Approximately 11 MB of built-in memory 
 * Built-in auto flash with red-eye reduction function 
 * Records movie at sizes up to 640 x 480 pixels with image quality rivaling camcorders 
 * Frame composite function allows you to add a decorative frame around the image when shooting 
 * Compatible with PictBridge, DPOF functions, Exif Print, and Print Image Matching III

What's in the box
Optio E30 digital camera, USB/AV cable I-UAV62, strap O-ST62, dock insert O-DI62, software S-SW62, 2 AA alkaline batteries
feature_bullets: 7.1-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 15 x 20-inch prints
Automatic adjustment of LCD brightness in sunlight
VGA-quality movies at 640 x 480 resolution with sound
Stores images on SD memory cards (includes 11MB internal memory); powered by 2 AA-size batteries (2 alkaline batteries included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars11 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
